fullContent: Homeâ€º RestaurantPapa's ScooperiaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPapa's Restaurantia series continues to serve yummy foods to customers with a brand new branch!In Papa's Scooperia, you'll be baking hot cookies, adding scoops of super-soft ice cream, drizzling syrups, sprinkling chocolate or peanut toppings, and serving up mouthwatering desserts. Your customers are hot, hungry, and waiting for the most delightful treats. Surprise them with your culinary skills, grow your business, and become the top ice cream shop in Oniontown!What's Papa's Scooperia?Papa's Scooperia is a cooking and restaurant management game where you prepare ice cream-topped cookies for your customers. Just like in Papa's Freezeria, your mission is to impress your patrons and keep them coming back for more.ControlsUse your mouse to navigate between stations and pick items.Drag syrups and sprinkles over the plate and release to pour.How to Play Papa's ScooperiaPapa Louie counts on you to run this ice cream business. Be a cheerful worker, craft perfect sundaes, and make strategic decisions while upgrading the shop. But first, master the stations. You'll be switching between them all day:Quick Look at Scooperia's StationsOrder Station: Take orders and note them down carefully.Dough Station: Scoop the preferred dough and dip it into chips or nuts.Bake Station: Bake the dough until golden brown, then top the fresh cookies with a giant scoop of vanilla or chocolate ice cream.Build Station: Add jellies, syrups, sprinkles, fruits, or waffle cones.Serving the SundaesWhen you're satisfied with your creation, drag the ticket to mark it as complete and serve it to your customers.It's an exciting moment when your customers evaluate your work, score your performance, and tip you accordingly.Meet new customers each day, learn their preferences (some hate waiting, others are picky about their orders), and grow your business.Unlock new ingredients and recipes, and decorate the Scooperia to improve customer satisfaction.Add a couch or a TV to keep them patient while they wait. The gameplay is more diverse than any other restaurant game.DeveloperPapa's Scooperia is a flash game developed by Flipline Studios.
